page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: On May 1st 1985,the{first sod}was cut by the{Mayor}of Bath on site of the new{Bathwick Saint Mary's Church of {England Primary}School. Due to be opened in September, 1986. School will replace old building in the city. New site is situated near A36 Warminster Road near to Kennet and Avon Canal and below Ministry of Defence Government Buildings. The ceremony of cutting turf was witnessed by School{Managers,}the {Rector}of{St. Mary's Church,Diocesan Officials, the{Headmaster, teachers, {parents}and{children}of the present school. The occasion stimulated good written and illustrative work from the chldren.There will be a{display}of this work in the new school.A{Time {Capsule}containing{modern}objects has been placed in foundations.
